sentence.Network_en: Mr Fama arrived at the EMH through some simple theoretical examples.
sentence.Network_cn: Fama先生通过一些简单的理论上的事例得到“有效市场假说”.

sentence.Network_en: But Mr Fama tested the predictions of the EMH on the behaviour of actual prices.
sentence.Network_cn: 但是Fama先生检验了“有效市场假说”对于真实价格变动行为的预测能力.

sentence.Network_en: Fama, Eugene , and Merton H. Miller, 1972, The Theory of Finance, II 1: Dryden Press.
